page.title: 05COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: IN THE {BRUNTON }AREA THERE IS ONLY ONE{TELEPHONE BOX,}BUT THERE ARE FORTY {TELEPHONES.}THERE IS ONLY ONE NEWLY FITTED{TELEPHONE.}THERE ARE TEN {CITIZEN BAND SYSTEMS}IN{BRUNTON.}SOME USERS HAVE BEEN IN CONTACT WITH OTHER PEOPLE AS FAR AWAY AS{TURKEY.}THERE IS NO{POST OFFICE}NEARER THAN{CUPAR.}THE {POSTMEN}COME ROUND AT ABOUT{10:30 AM. THERE ARE 6 DIFFERENT{POSTMEN.}THEY COME EVERY DAY APART FROM{SUNDAYS. THEY ALSO HELP YOU BY GIVING YOU A LIFT TO{CUPAR,}OR BY PUTTING A STAMP ON THE ENVELOPE OR PARCEL.
